item.title: Massive potholes all down the road, 15th April

item.title: Mattress fly tipped rear of shops, 15th April
item.description:
A mattress has been moving around the rear of Caernarvon court for at least 6 months. It’s now in a very rough condition and has been moved in to the far corner by the garages, with brambles growing over it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Montgomery Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
